long_description: The Ruffwear Cloud Chaser dog jacket is an all-weather soft-shell that protects your canine companion against rain, snow, wind and cold so you don't miss a moment of outdoor fun together. Convenient full-length zipper on the left side allows for easy on/off. Three-layer soft-shell upper fabric panels are waterproof and windproof. Coated fabric on lower panel repels water, snow and dirt. Soft, insulating interior keeps your dog warm and helps eliminate chafing. Raglan sleeves help seal in warmth and allow full range of motion for your dog's front legs. The Ruffwear Cloud Chaser dog jacket features strategically placed reflective trim to enhance visibility in low light; light loop accommodates a safety light (sold separately).
short_description: The Ruffwear Cloud Chaser dog jacket is an all-weather soft-shell that protects your canine companion against rain, snow, wind and cold so you don't miss a moment of outdoor fun together.
